title: Subaxial Injury Classification and Severity Scale (SLICS)
desc: The Subaxial Injury Classification (SLIC) and Severity Score classifies the severity of subaxial cervical spine injury.

orgreference.text: Patel AA, Dailey A, Brodke DS, et al. Subaxial cervical spine trauma classification: the Subaxial Injury Classification system and case examples. Neurosurg Focus. 2008;25(5):E8.
